text: Brotherhood of Justice is a 1986 American action drama movie. It was directed by Charles Braverman. The movie stars Keanu Reeves, Kiefer Sutherland, Lori Loughlin, Joe Spano, Billy Zane, Darren Dalton, Danny Nucci. It was distributed by Lionsgate. ==Other websites== * * Category:1986 action movies Category:1986 drama movies Category:1986 crime drama movies Category:American television movies Category:1980s American action movies Category:1980s American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Charles Braverman Category:Movies set in Texas
title: Brotherhood of Justice
